messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] More on Conference Timing (A Poll)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/6/03 7:51:29 AM, KathrynJB@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/6/03 7:51:29 AM, KathrynJB@... writes:

<< Okay folks...I have been bombarded with e-mail, etc. on the timing of the
conference, unfortunately not all of it particularly nice. >>

That's horrible.

I'm sorry now that I even wrote the "yeah! After school starts they need
it!" little thing, because if you're doing it you can do it your way.

<<You have five choices: April or May, Memorial Day weekend (maybe even with
an
extra day), August, early November, or ANY!>>

The problem with polls like that is that people's first choices don't reflect
what their "can't possibly" dates are. I could do any except Memorial Day.

Sandra

messages.subject: More on Conference Timing (A Poll)
messages.msgSnippet: Okay folks...I have been bombarded with e-mail, etc. on the timing of the conference, unfortunately not all of it particularly nice. I would love to go forward
messages.messageBody:
Okay folks...I have been bombarded with e-mail, etc. on the timing of the
conference, unfortunately not all of it particularly nice. I would love to go
forward with this, and I want people to come! And since no one else has mentioned
wanting to do it, I'm going forward.

Late September and all of October are really not options. The area is crammed
with tourists visiting Salem for Haunted Happenings. If you'd like to come
during that time, please do, and we'll have a good time. Just not for a
conference.

So, I'm doing a poll. Go to this URL and weigh in on your chosen time of year
for this.

<A HREF="http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Unschooling-dotcom/polls">http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Unschooling-dotcom/polls</A>

You have five choices: April or May, Memorial Day weekend (maybe even with an
extra day), August, early November, or ANY!

I already have some great plans happening...now we have to figure out WHEN so
I can figure out WHERE.

Please vote ASAP!!!!

Thank you!

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
